name: Pygpio
body:
Program name: UDP GPIO Controller
Main executable: GPIO_Server.py
Author: "Weqaar Janjua" <weqaar.janjua@sensorflock.com>


Files Description:
------------------
gpio.conf - configuration file

Description:
------------
*) Execute the GPIO UDP Server on machine that is required to control GPIO PINs
*) Controls GPIO over UDP
*) A gtk client is provided under the client directory
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
